metadata.title: CVE-2024-46749 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: btnxpuart: Fix Null pointer dereference in btnxpuart_flush()This adds a check before freeing the
